Name: Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla
About the game: ' Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla ' is an adventure game in which you play as Layla , a former, high-ranking member of a secret order of assassins. Story During one of your missions, you find that something is very amiss with the order, and that you are unable to carry out the mission. The retribution of the order is swift, and merciless. You are kidnapped, and brought to a desolate island. There to ponder your sins, and spend the remainder of your days. But on the island itself, great events are unfolding, of which you will become a integral part. Features * Join Layla on a great adventure of swashbuckling, pirates, and magics most foul! * Explore a vibrant tropical island and meet interesting (and very rarely sober) characters! * Fight and defeat evil foes and menacing monsters! * Discover a dark cult seeking to bring back the Lord of Flame! Lantern of Worlds Lantern of Worlds - The Story of Layla is part of the Lantern of Worlds universe. For more games in the Lantern of Worlds universe, see below! / /
